# (PART\*) Raster Data {-}

# Introduction to Raster Data

## Overview

This workshop introduces raster data and how to work with it in R. We will be working through the first part of the [Geospatial Data workshop](https://datacarpentry.org/r-raster-vector-geospatial/) put together by Data Carpentry. 

Please download data for this workshop at [this link](http://datacarpentry.org/geospatial-workshop/data/).

## Links

- Introduction to Raster Data, Data Carpentry (what is it?): https://datacarpentry.org/organization-geospatial/01-intro-raster-data/index.html
- Working with Raster Data in R, Data Carpentry: https://datacarpentry.org/r-raster-vector-geospatial/01-raster-structure/index.html
- Data for this workshop: http://datacarpentry.org/geospatial-workshop/data/
- Great resource for more tutorials regarding spatial data: https://www.earthdatascience.org
